General.Name: Hangzhou Wensli Silk Culture Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hangzhou Wensli Silk Culture Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures Chinese silk cultural products, silk ornaments, and silk artworks. Its products also include silk scarfs, pajamas, home textiles, neckties, and gifts. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: Xiaoshan International Airport Terminal Building, Hangzhou, China
